本船: (ほんせん) - mother ship; this ship
本船渡し: (ほんせんわたし) - free on board (i.e. seller pays to have goods placed on a ship); FOB
本草学: (ほんぞうがく) - study of medicinal herbs; pharmacognosy
本表: (ほんぴょう) - main table; this table
本訴: (ほんそ) - {law} original suit; main lawsuit; main action
本読み: (ほんよみ) - script reading/scenario reading; avid reader/bookworm; reading a book/reading books
本調子: (ほんちょうし) - normal condition; keynote/proper key
本論: (ほんろん) - main discourse; this subject; body (of a speech)
本論文: (ほんろんぶん) - this thesis; this article; the article under consideration
本諸子: (ホンモロコ) - willow gudgeon (species of fish, Gnathopogon caerulescens)
本身: (ほんみ) - real sword (as opposed to a wooden practice sword)
本道: (ほんどう) - highway; main road; the right road
本邦: (ほんぽう) - this country; our country
本部: (ほんぶ) - headquarters; head office; main office
本部長: (ほんぶちょう) - general manager; director-general
本醸造: (ほんじょうぞう) - pure brew (e.g. sake, soy sauce)
本醸造酒: (ほんじょうぞうしゅ) - sake brewed without addition of saccharides and no more than 120 litres of seed alcohol per tonne
本鈴: (ほんれい) - bell signalling that work, class, etc. has formally begun
本門: (ほんもん) - main gate/front gate; latter half of the Lotus Sutra, which describes the nature of the Buddha
本開き: (ほんびらき) - functioning cuff buttons on a jacket (i.e. those that can be buttoned and unbuttoned); surgeon's cuffs
本降り: (ほんぶり) - regular rainfall; downpour; raining in earnest
本院: (ほんいん) - this institution; the main institution
本陣: (ほんじん) - troop headquarters/stronghold; inn designated for use by a daimyo (Edo period)
本隊: (ほんたい) - main body (of an army)/main force; these troops
本震: (ほんしん) - main shock (of an earthquake)
本音: (ほんね) - (ant: 建前・1) real intention; motive; true opinion; what one really thinks
本音をいう: (ほんねをいう) - to speak one's mind; to be frank; to tell the truth; to be brutally honest
本音を言う: (ほんねをいう) - to speak one's mind; to be frank; to tell the truth; to be brutally honest
本項: (ほんこう) - nub; core of the issue
本領: (ほんりょう) - speciality/specialty/characteristic; proper function/duty; original fief
本領を発揮: (ほんりょうをはっき) - to display one's real ability; to show one's real ability; to show one's stuff; to show oneself at one's best; to really shine; to come into one's own; to find one's feet (legs); to hit (strike) one's stride
本領安堵: (ほんりょうあんど) - (yoji) recognition and guarantee, by the shogunate, of ownership of the inherited estate of a samurai who pledged allegiance to it (in the Kamakura and early Muromachi periods)
本領発揮: (ほんりょうはっき) - (yoji) show one's real ability; illustration of the distinctive character of (something)
本題: (ほんだい) - main question; real issue at hand
本題に入る: (ほんだいにはいる) - to get down to business; to cut to the chase; to get straight to the point; to move on to the main subject
本願: (ほんがん) - Amida Buddha's original vow; long-cherished desire
本願寺派: (ほんがんじは) - Honganji sect (of Shin Buddhism)
本食い虫: (ほんくいむし) - bookworm (literal and figurative)
本鮪: (ホンマグロ) - Pacific bluefin tuna (edible fish, Thunnus orientalis)
札: (satsu/fuda) - tag , banknote, bill, note, paper money
札を付ける: (ふだをつける) - to label; to put a tag on
札付: (ふだつき) - tagged (esp. with a price); notorious/infamous/double-dyed/hardened
札付き: (ふだつき) - tagged (esp. with a price); notorious/infamous/double-dyed/hardened
札所: (ふだしょ) - temple which issues amulets
札止め: (ふだどめ) - full house; sold out
札片を切る: (さつびらをきる) - to spend money freely; to blow one's money
朱で描く: (あかでえがく) - to miniate; to paint red
朱に交われば赤くなる: (しゅにまじわればあかくなる) - he who touches pitch shall be defiled therewith; one rotten apple spoils the barrel
朱に染まる: (あけにそまる) - to welter in blood; to be covered in blood
朱をそそぐ: (しゅをそそぐ) - to flush bright red (e.g. of someone's face)
朱を入れる: (しゅをいれる) - to retouch; to correct
朱を注ぐ: (しゅをそそぐ) - to flush bright red (e.g. of someone's face)
朱印状: (しゅいんじょう) - license with a red seal (licence); shogunate license to trade (licence)
朱印船: (しゅいんせん) - shogunate-licensed trading ship
朱唇皓歯: (しゅしんこうし) - (yoji) red lips and pearly white teeth (said of beautiful women)
朱嘴鸛: (シュバシコウ) - white stork (Ciconia ciconia)
朱塗: (しゅぬり) - painting something vermillion; lacquering something vermillion; vermillion-lacquered object
朱塗り: (しゅぬり) - painting something vermillion; lacquering something vermillion; vermillion-lacquered object
朱墨: (しゅぼく) - red-ink stick; red and black
朱子学: (しゅしがく) - neo-Confucianism (based on the teachings of Zhu Xi and his followers)
朱文金: (しゅぶんきん) - Japanese shubunkin goldfish variety
朱欒: (ザボン) - shaddock (por: zamboa); pomelo; Citrus maximus; Citrus grandis; Citrus decumana
朱泥: (しゅでい) - unglazed reddish brown pottery (originally from China)
朱珍: (しちん) - satin with raised figures (por: setim, dut: satijn)
